name: Garden Veggie Family Frittata
description: A quick and tasty breakfast the whole family will love!

ingredients.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or Dip Mix of your choice, divided

ingredients.name: crumbled goat cheese or feta cheese

preparation: Dice peppers and zucchini. Cut tomatoes in halves. Place in Round Cake Pan; season with 1 tsp mix, salt and pepper.
In a large bowl, whisk eggs with remaining 1 tsp dip mix.
Pour egg mixture over veggies; stir in cheese. Microwave, uncovered, 11–12 min, or until centre is set when pan is jiggled.
Cut into wedges with a silicone spatula and add toppings, if using.
tips: The 3-in-1 Spatula is perfect for cutting wedges right in the pan!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve on 1⁄2 cup mixed greens with 1 slice toast and 2 tsp nut or seed butter.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!
